meanings: an answer [a response] to a signal, an answer signal.
군사 response to request for information (RRI)

examples.korean: answer a distress call from a ship 듣기 Add to Wordbook 선박에서의 조난신호에 응신(應信)하다. 영어영작문대사전

examples.korean: The Coast Guard received an initial mayday call at about 11:15 p.m. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 연안경비대가 오후 11시 15분경에 최초로 구조신호를 응신하였다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 폴키(tkov****)
